WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Buffs] Hide buffs if not right profession

Comments.Message: We need to add a call to rebuild the Buff tab when these changes occur, presently they only happen on model load, which is why I didn't make code for this in the first place.

Yup I am aware - I was going to add an "Character.OnProfessionChange" event that forms could listen for. The buffSelector can then listen for the change and act accordingly.

I've done the bulk of the code, I just need to do some rigorous testing. However I'll get onto that tomorrow with a clear head as I need to eat now and could do with just relaxing this evening.

You could perhaps add professions to the "glyphs" tab or next to it.  This could also then remove certain profession specific items & enchants automatically from the lists as well as include/not include the profession specific buffs.
Already done RareBeast but on the main form that was done last week or the week before.
